Bash(# Read current content
cp /Users/sam/notebook-scratch/front_modeling.py /tmp/temp_notebook.py

# Modify the temp file
sed ''s/1:03 PM - AUTO-SAVE TEST (no manual save)/1:04 PM - ATOMIC REPLACE TEST/'' /tmp/temp_notebook.py > /tmp/modified_notebook.py

# Atomic replace - this should trigger FileModifiedEvent
mv /tmp/modified_notebook.py /Users/sam/notebook-scratch/front_modeling.py

echo ""Performed atomic file replacement"")
